message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was hoping to get a bit more for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we try $130?
I can see you're still interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $128?
I understand you're still a bit short, but I'm not willing to go below $135. I can offer you a compromise, so I can sell it to you for $132.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. How about we meet at $130?
I've already offered you $132 and you're coming back to $130? I'm willing to meet you there, but I'm not going to give you a better deal. I'll sell it to you for $130.
